T04D3962:198b-1: bo dhi sa tva sya m'a rga kra ma sam gra ha /
T04D3962:198b-3: byang chub sems dpa'i lam gyi rim pa mdor bsdus pa /
T04D3962:198b-4: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
T04D3962:198b-5: sku gsum bdag nyid kun khyab rtag / shes rab thugs rje dbyer med pas //
T04D3962:198b-6: sems can don kun sgrub mdzad pa //
T04D3962:198b-7: rdzogs sangs rgyas la gus phyag 'tshal //
T04D3962:198b-8: gdul bya'i skye bo rjes gzung phyir //
T04D3962:198b-9: byams dpal lo rts'a sa [?] rab skul bas //
T04D3962:198b-10: rgyal sras lam rim 'dor bsdus ni //
T04D3962:198b-11: bdag gis ji ltar bzod ltar brjod //
T04D3962:198b-12: thog mar bshes gnyen bsten bya ste //
T04D3962:198b-13: de yi legs spyad yon tan blang //
T04D3962:198b-14: de yang sems can don brtson nus //
T04D3962:198b-15: shes sogs yon tan pha rol phyin //
T04D3962:198b-16: phun tshogs dal ba myur du 'jig / las dang de 'bras sdug bsngal yin //
T04D3962:198b-17: de spong shes rab snying brtse bsgom //
T04D3962:198b-18: kun mkhyen bstan pa'i snying po'o //
T04D3962:198b-19: mi khom brgyad spangs 'byor bcas pa'i ;
T04D3962:198b-20: / dal ba phun tshogs rnyed dka' ste //
T04D3962:198b-21: rgya mtsho cher g-yengs shing bug tu //
T04D3962:198b-22: rus sbal mgrin chud rang mtshungs gsungs //
T04D3962:198b-23: de yang mi rtag mdun gnas te //
T04D3962:198b-24: skad cig mi sdong rnam par 'jig /'du byed sdug bsngal rang bzhin 'dir //
T04D3962:198b-25: chos dang gang zag bdag med nyid //
T04D3962:198b-26: de bzhin nyon mongs nye nyon mongs //
T04D3962:198b-27: lus ngag yid kyis bskyed pa yi //
T04D3962:198b-28: dge dang mi dge kun 'byung ba //
T04D3962:198b-29: las dang nyon mongs ming gis ga dgas //
T04D3962:198b-32: dge bas lha dang mir 'phen mod //
T04D3962:198b-33: de yang yongs 'gyur sdug bsngal nyid //
T04D3962:198b-34: de bas sems can don sgrub phyir //
T04D3962:198b-35: byang chub sems bskyed de yi rgyun //
T04D3962:198b-36: stong nyid snying rje'i snying po can //
T04D3962:198b-37: bsgom bya lam gyi mchog yin no //
T04D3962:198b-38: lus dang tshor ba sems dang chos //
T04D3962:198b-39: phyi nang gnyis dag tshul lus kyi //
T04D3962:198b-40: mtshan nyid rjes brtags mnyam 'jog pa //
T04D3962:198b-41: dran pa nye bar gzhag bzhi bsgom //
T04D3962:198b-42: dge chos bskyed cing rnam 'phel dang //
T04D3962:198b-43: sdig sems mi bskyed nyer 'joms pa //
T04D3962:198b-44: bde gshegs kyis gsungs skyon sel phyir //
T04D3962:198b-45: yang dag spong ba bzhi rab bsgrags //
T04D3962:198b-47: dpyod pa'i bya brag gis phye ba //
T04D3962:199a-1: mthun gnyen po'i phyogs dbang gis //
T04D3962:199a-3: dad dang brtson 'grus dran pa dang //
T04D3962:199a-4: ting 'dzin shes rab ces grags pa //
T04D3962:199a-5: thar pa'i rgyu yi sbyor ba yis //
T04D3962:199a-6: rgyal sras dbang po lngar gsungs so //
T04D3962:199a-7: dad sogs rnam 'phel lnga thob pa //
T04D3962:199a-8: mi mthun phyogs 'joms zag bcas dang //
T04D3962:199a-9: zag pa med mtha' bcas 'di dag //
T04D3962:199a-10: sangs rgyas rnams kyi stobs zhes bstan //
T04D3962:199a-12: dga' dang shin tu sbyangs pa dang //
T04D3962:199a-13: ting nge 'dzin dang btang snyoms rnams //
T04D3962:199a-14: byang chub yan lag bdun du 'dod//
T04D3962:199a-15: yan lag lta dang rtog pa dang //
T04D3962:199a-16: ngag dang las mtha' 'tsho ba dang //
T04D3962:199a-18: 'phags lam yan lag brgyad du bzhed //
T04D3962:199a-19: sangs rgyas kun gyi bgrod pa'i lam //
T04D3962:199a-20: byang chub phyogs chos sum cu bdun //
T04D3962:199a-21: blo ldan rnams kyis mnyam rjes su //
T04D3962:199a-22: zab yangs rjes 'brel rtag tu bsgom //
T04D3962:199a-23: de la gsum ni tshogs kyi lam //
T04D3962:199a-24: gnyis rim nges 'byed yan lag dang //
T04D3962:199a-25: byang chub yan lag mthong lam ste //
T04D3962:199a-26: yan lag brgyad ni bsgom lam du'o //
T04D3962:199a-27: sdug bsngal me gsum gyis skrag pas //
T04D3962:199a-28: skye bo 'khor ba las dbyung phyir //
T04D3962:199a-29: snying brtse brtson 'grus dang ldan gyis //
T04D3962:199a-30: sangs rgyas nyid bsgrub blo gros bskyed //
T04D3962:199a-31: phung po bdag min de la bdag //
T04D3962:199a-32: ldan min bdag kyang de min te //
T04D3962:199a-33: de ldan ma yin bya byed kyi //
T04D3962:199a-34: mthun dngos min bdag stong pa nyid //
T04D3962:199a-35: khyab dang rtag dang byed po dang //
T04D3962:199a-36: rang dbang longs spyod chos nyid can //
T04D3962:199a-37: bdag ni phung po dang 'gal bas //
T04D3962:199a-38: de'i phyir de gcig ji ltar 'grub //
T04D3962:199a-39: bya dang byed pa'i dngos po ni //
T04D3962:199a-40: rtag tu lhan cig srid ma yin //
T04D3962:199a-41: de yang de ldan ma yin pas //
T04D3962:199a-42: de yi gzhan phyogs gsum yang ngo //
T04D3962:199a-43: phung po yang der rigs min te //
T04D3962:199a-44: de yis de ltar 'dod byas pas //
T04D3962:199a-45: rtag tu thar pa thob gyur te //
T04D3962:199a-46: gzugs sogs dngos bral mthar phyin to //
T04D3962:199a-47: sgyu 'dra'i phyi rol gzung don med //
T04D3962:199a-48: de med der 'dzin yod ma yin //
T04D3962:199a-49: rnam rig tsam de shes de yang //
T04D3962:199a-50: gdod nas ma skyes chos bdag med //
T04D3962:199a-51: brtse ba tsam gyis srid par 'phan //
T04D3962:199a-52: shes rab dman pas mya ngan 'da' //
T04D3962:199a-53: de'i phyir phan tshun mnyam ldan pa //
T04D3962:199b-0: rgyal bas bla @199b med lam du gsungs //
T04D3962:199b-1: thi gu las sbrul 'dir bsal med //
T04D3962:199b-2: thi gu'ang gsar gzhan cag yang med //
T04D3962:199b-3: mar mes thi gu yang dag mthong //
T04D3962:199b-4: de mthong 'jigs pa rnam par spangs //
T04D3962:199b-5: 'di la bsal bya ci yang med //
T04D3962:199b-6: gzhag par bya ba'ang cung zad med //
T04D3962:199b-7: yang dag nyid la yang dag lta //
T04D3962:199b-8: yang dag mthong na rnam grol bshad //
T04D3962:199b-9: 'di dag dman par bsgoms na ni //
T04D3962:199b-11: bsam sor yang ni dman nyid kyis //
T04D3962:199b-12: bdag tu lta ba spong bar byed //
T04D3962:199b-13: rgya chen 'gro ba'i don bsgrubs pas //
T04D3962:199b-14: byang chub sems dpa' nyid kho nas //
T04D3962:199b-15: bsam pa la sogs khyad par gyis /
T04D3962:199b-17: bdag gis 'di bsdus bsod nams ni //
T04D3962:199b-18: bskrun gyur gang des skye bo kun //
T04D3962:199b-19: rdzogs pa'i byang chub mchog thob nas //
T04D3962:199b-20: 'gro la phan bde sbyin par shog //
T04D3962:199b-21: dge slong sh'a kya'i dpal bzang min //
T04D3962:199b-22: bdag dang gdul bya lhan cig tu //
T04D3962:199b-23: byams mgon 'phags pa'i zhabs pad drung //
T04D3962:199b-24: skyes nas de dgongs gsal byed shog //
T04D3962:199b-25: byang chub dpa'i lam gyi rim pa de kho na nyid bsdus pa /
T04D3962:199b-26: dpal chos kyi rje sa'i steng na 'gran zla dang bral ba'i pandi ta chen po /
T04D3962:199b-27: ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas gsum par yongs su grags
T04D3962:199b-28: pa'i kha che sh'a kya shr'i bzang pos mdzad pa
T04D3962:199b-30: / pandi ta chen po de nyid dang lo ts'a
T04D3962:199b-31: ba byams pa'i dpal gyis rgyang ro sa lu'i gtsug
